attributes.additional_details: The plan is not only a huge burden on the British taxpayer, it is a direct infringement on the right to freedom & privacy, which in a free & democratic country is deeply concerning. The plans make reference to “immunity/virus free passports,” likely to be available through an app. Essentially a "Health Passport" or could otherwise be called "Digital I.D" . Furthermore, it may determine if you are permitted to work, travel, attend events or visit a relative. Control by coersion is unacceptable.
attributes.background:
Citizens of the UK demand Government halt its plans to spend £100 billion of taxpayers money on Operation Moonshot.

It is clearly: 

Financially unviable
Logistically impossible
Ethically dispicable
Legally controversial
